mapper.select: SELECT e.ename,e.esex,e.employeeid,e.etrytimes,e.ecreid,e.eaddress,e.ephone,p.positionname,d.dename,e.phone1,e.email FROM employee AS e INNER JOIN POSITION AS p ON e.positionid = p.positionid INNER JOIN department AS d ON e.deid = d.deid WHERE e.ezuant = 1

SELECT e.ename,e.esex,e.employeeid,e.etrytimes,e.ecreid,e.eaddress,e.ephone,p.positionname,d.dename FROM employee AS e INNER JOIN POSITION AS p ON e.positionid = p.positionid INNER JOIN department AS d ON e.deid = d.deid WHERE e.ezuant = 1 and e.ename like '%${ename}%'

SELECT e.ename,e.esex,e.employeeid,e.etrytimes,e.elaimes,e.eyunayin,e.ecreid,e.eaddress,e.ephone,p.positionname,d.dename FROM employee AS e INNER JOIN POSITION AS p ON e.positionid = p.positionid INNER JOIN department AS d ON e.deid = d.deid WHERE e.ezuant = 0

SELECT e.employeeid,e.epwd,p.positionid,p.positionname,f.fid,f.fcode,f.fname,f.fpid,f.createdate FROM employee AS e INNER JOIN POSITION AS p ON e.positionid = p.positionid INNER JOIN authority AS a ON a.positionid = p.positionid INNER JOIN FUNCTION AS f ON a.functionId = f.fid WHERE e.employeeid = #{employeeid} AND e.epwd = #{epwd}
mapper.sql: employeeid, ephone, epwd, esex, ecreid, eaddress, etrytimes, elaimes, ezuant, eyunayin, phone1, email, deid, statusid, positionid, column1, column2, column3, column4
mapper.insert: insert into employee (employeeid, ephone, epwd, esex, ecreid, eaddress, etrytimes, elaimes, ezuant, eyunayin, phone1, email, deid, statusid, positionid, column1, column2, column3, column4, ename) values (#{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{epwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etrytimes,jdbcType=DATE}, #{elaimes,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ezuant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eyunayin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

ephone,

mapper.update:
update employee
ephone = #{ephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epwd = #{epwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
esex = #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ecreid = #{ecreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eaddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etrytimes = #{etrytimes,jdbcType=DATE},
elaimes = #{elaimes,jdbcType=DATE},
ezuant = #{ezuant,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eyunayin = #{eyunayin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deid = #{deid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
statusid = #{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
positionid = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
column1 = #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column2 = #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column3 = #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column4 = #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ename = #{ename,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where employeeid = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update employee set ephone = #{ephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, epwd = #{epwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, esex = #{esex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ecreid = #{ecreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eaddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etrytimes = #{etrytimes,jdbcType=DATE}, elaimes = #{elaimes,jdbcType=DATE}, ezuant = #{ezuant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eyunayin = #{eyunayin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deid = #{deid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statusid = #{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, positionid = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, column1 = #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column2 = #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column3 = #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column4 = #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ename = #{ename,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where employeeid = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
